headline: Waste Management (NYSE:WM) Q1 2025 Sales Rise to US$6 Billion, Net Income Falls
summary: Waste Management (NYSE:WM) recently reported a mixed performance for Q1 2025 with a 17% increase in sales but a 10% decline in net income compared to the previous year. Despite these results, the company's share price rose by 7.22% last quarter. This movement coincides with Waste Management's ambitious sustainability initiatives, including the opening of new recycling and renewable natural gas facilities, as part of a significant growth strategy.
